snippet: Coach Sean Payton has chosen Rob Ryan, the brother of Jets Coach Rex Ryan, as the New Orleans Saints’ defensive coordinator.
abstract: New Orleans Saints hire Rob Ryan as defensive coordinator.
lead_paragraph: Coach Sean Payton has chosen Rob Ryan, the brother of Jets Coach Rex Ryan, as the New Orleans Saints’ defensive coordinator.

headline.seo: Saints Hire Rob Ryan as Defensive Coordinator
headline.main: Saints Hire Rob Ryan as Defensive Coordinator
